transcript:

Executive: IndiaMART account manager.
Customer: Yeah, sir, tell me. So basically your service is hosted just few days ago. So I need to give the platform meeting. I have to do the video meeting with you. I have to give the proper

Executive: I got your point. So there is a your service, your service is hosted now and your service is live. So there is a training. I will take I have to do the video meeting with you. I have to do all the details about IndiaMART how you have to use the IndiaMART service properly.
Customer: Sir, sir, this meeting, everything it's okay. It's it's secondary. I know. Okay. I know, sir. I paid the amount, okay. When I contacted him, he said the already the lead was closed in the IndianMART only before three hours. Okay. So giving me a contact for for a single phone number 500 rupees, that is which is not at all worthy for me, not even a single penny. Okay. So that's what I am asking.
Executive: Okay. So you're concerned about the training, these all things you can tell me secondary things. Wait, wait, wait, sir, please let me speak.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Your your balance is also provided. We also credit the same lead. So that is the same lead in your account. You can check them.
Customer: Means my my amount is credited?
Executive: Credit your buylead. We credit your buylead. That okay. Okay, we credit your that buylead in your account. So now we will the extra buylead is also credit in your account. Okay. So now your service now your service is live. So we have to provide

Customer: Your voice now I'm now I'm audible.
Executive: Hello? If if the signal is not good, you can call me in WhatsApp, sir. No issue.
Executive: Sir, there is a video meeting time. So there is a video meeting actually we have to do the video meeting with you. We have to properly give the proper training about the IndiaMART service. So can we do the video meeting with you? It will take hardly five minutes, sir.

Executive: Okay, so please open your Gmail. I will share with the video meeting link.

Executive: Vinesh sir, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. That link is not available. Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Wait, sir. Kumar wait.

Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Please go through this link.

Customer: Sir, tell me. Please tell me your mail ID.
Customer: Kumar@gmail.com.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a closed lead.

- Wants to connect via WhatsApp for video meeting.



Resolution:

- Credited the customer's account with the buylead.

- Shared video meeting link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meeting, whatsapp
